thread.title: Lalitya Munshaw back with her new album this Navratri
thread.title_full: Lalitya Munshaw back with her new album this Navratri - The Times of India

author: timesofindia.indiatimes.com
title: Lalitya Munshaw back with her new album this Navratri
text:
Singer-performer Lalitya Munshaw has wowed audiences with her mellifluous voice and earned critical acclaim in India and abroad for her acts.
Post the successful launch of her most popular Navratri album, Aye Halo , she is back with another non-stop raas-garba album titled Dholida Na Dhol . With leading artistes of the industry having lent their voices to it, she hopes it will rule this festive season.
READ: Dance to the beats of Prem Leela this Navratri
Besides singing famous Bollywood numbers, Lalitya has had albums in diverse genres like fusion, folk, Sufi, ghazal and devotional and for children as well to her credit. She recently celebrated silver jubilee with her 25th Sufi album, Rab Piya , which was unveiled by Raveena Tandon and Shraddha Kapoor . Lalitya, who had some of her albums launched by PM Narendra Modi and celebs like Rishi Kapoor and Hema Malini , also has a music label and recording studio in Mumbai.
